text: This block checks the result of the last deal. In case if the parameter is Win, it returns ‘True’ if the last trade was successful, otherwise it returns an empty string. In case if the parameter is Loss, it returns ‘True’ if the last trade was unsuccessful, otherwise it returns an empty string.
This block can be used only within “Trade again”.
1. These are the common parameters among most trade types.
2. These are the parameters for the Digits trade type.
3. These are the parameters for the Touch/No Touch trade type.
4. These are the parameters for the Ends In/Out trade type.
